iep_goals: Write complete sentences with proper capitalization and punctuation with 70% accuracy
Add and subtract two-digit numbers without regrouping with 85% accuracy
accommodations: Pencil grips and adapted writing tools

interviews.parent: Parent reports Marcus loves math manipulatives but avoids writing activities at home.
interviews.teacher: Marcus participates verbally but struggles to get his ideas down on paper.

observations.psychologist: Fine motor difficulties impacting written output; strong verbal reasoning skills.
